questions.question: What is the purpose of adjusting the interpupillary distance (IPD) on your VR headset?

answers.a: To match the distance between your eyes for better visual clarity.
answers.b: To reduce motion sickness during gameplay.
answers.c: To set the play area boundary automatically.

questions.question: Which of the following methods improves tracking accuracy in a PC-connected VR headset?

answers.a: Using additional external sensors or base stations.
answers.b: Increasing the screen brightness on the headset.
answers.c: Turning off all nearby wireless devices.

questions.question: When using a wireless adapter for a VR headset, what is the primary requirement for smooth performance?

answers.a: A high-speed Wi-Fi connection with low latency.
answers.b: A direct USB-C connection to the PC.
answers.c: A room with minimal light for better tracking.
